Lebih 'Mahal', Pelat Nomor 'Bunglon' Mudah Terekam CCTV
01 Nov 2019, 13:48 by , https://www.facebook.com/CNNIndonesia


Ilustrasi. (Foto: CNN Indonesia/Djonet Sugiarto)

Jakarta, CNN Indonesia -- Pelat nomor kendaraanÂ yang bisa berubah warna diklaim memudahkan petugas polisi menjerat pelanggar peraturan lalu lintas melalui sistem tilang CCTV atau Electronic Traffic Law Enforcement (E-TLE).Menurut polisi pelat nomor kendaraan ini lebih jelas terekam kamera CCTV daripada pelat nomor yang beredar luas di masyarakat. Bagi pengguna pelat nomor 'bunglon' yang melanggar aturan lalu lintas akan lebih mudah terjerat tilang CCTV.Perlu diketahui pelat baru yang bisa berubah warna ini tak berlaku umum, atau dipersilakan bagi masyarakat yang tertarik membelinya, sebab pelat nomor baru ini masuk program pelat nomor pilihan atau Nomor Registrasi Kendaraan Bermotor (NRKB).Untuk mendapatkan pelat khusus ini masyarakat setidaknya harus merogoh kocek lebih sebesar Rp5 juta sampai Rp20 juta, sesuai ketentuan Peraturan Pemerintah No. 60 tahun 2016 Tentang Jenis dan Tarif atas Jenis Penerimaan Negara Bukan Pajak (PNBP) yang berlaku pada Kepolisian Negara Republik Indonesia. Sedangkan penerbitan pelat nomor kendaraan standar per pasang hanya Rp100 ribu untuk mobil dan Rp60 ribu motor.Fredi, salah satu yang menggunakan pelat nomor baru memperoleh Tanda Nomor Kendaraan Bermotor (TNKB) itu karena kebetulan memesan pelat nomor pilihan beberapa waktu lalu. Fredi menggunakan pelat nomor 'cantik' dua angka dan tiga huruf di belakang yang dalam aturan pelat pilihan ini dibanderol Rp10 juta."Waktu pesan pelat baru tahu-tahunya sudah model yang bisa ganti warna. Tadinya pengen yang seperti biasa saja (warna hitam), tapi kata petugasnya sekarang untuk pelat nomor pilihan, semua sudah seperti ini," ungkap Fredi melalui pesan singkat, Jumat (1/11).Menurut Fredi lebih baik menggunakan bahan pelat seperti sebelumnya, sebab Ia sadar pelat jenis ini lebih mudah 'terlacak' CCTV tilang."Ya katanya pelat ini lebih gampang kena tilang CCTV. Jadi katanya lebih jelas nomor pelatnya keliatan. Tapi karena udah tidak bisa (gunain yang lama), yaudah tidak-apa," kata Fredi."Tapi anehnya sekarang kenapa yang dikasih pelat baru tilang elektrik cuma nopol beli aja, kalau nopol acak standar malah dikasih bahan biasa," ungkapnya kemudian.Ia mengatakan polisi seharusnya menyamaratakan antara pelat nomor biasa dan khusus jika tujuannya menekan angka pelanggaran lalu lintas lewat tilang kamera."Ya tidak adil aja. Kenapa tidak semua pelat nomor baru pakai pelat bahan baru ini," ucap dia.Direktur Registrasi dan Identifikasi (Regident) Korps Lalu Lintas (Korlantas) Polri Brigadir Jenderal Halim Pagarra menanggapi bila ketentuan pelat nomor kendaraan pilihan itu sangat menguntungkan konsumen. Sebab, dijelaskan Halim pelat NRKB baru sudah tidak bisa lagi diduplikasi tangan-tangan jahil.Halim berujar saat ini banyak pengendara yang membuat pelat palsu bergaya seperti nomor pilihan. Dengan material baru ini dipastikan oknum kesulitan menduplikasi NRKB."Dulu itu sama dengan pelat biasa. Nah ini kualitas lebih bagus ya diuntungkan dong. Terus tidak ada lagi orang yang berani membuat duplikat karena material beda pakai hot stamping sama embossing, bukan cat yang manual," ucap Halim.Halim menuturkan jika pengguna menggunakan pelat biasa, bukan berarti itu tak bisa terbaca CCTV."Semua itu bisa terbaca CCTV, pelat biasa juga bisa. Cuma memang kan yang NRKB lebih jelas saja. Tapi tetap bisa dibaca CCTV (untuk pelat biasa)," ungkap Halim.Lebih dari itu Halim belum mengetahui kapan pelat berubah warna ini diterapkan nasional menggantikan TNKB."Saya tidak tahu kapan, karena anggaran juga. Itu lebih ke bagian pengadaan," ucap Halim. Pengadaan TNKB nomor pilihan baru ada di enam Polda, meliputi Polda di seluruh Pulau Jawa dan Polda Bali, serta Polda Lampung. Sejauh ini ada 10 area dengan sistem tilang CCTV, sebelumnya tilang CCTV hanya berlaku di dua area lama yakni di Jalan M.H Thamrin dan Merdeka Barat. Berikut 10 area baru kamera tilang CCTV:1. JPO MRT Bundaran Senayan - satu CCTV2. JPO MRT Polda Semanggi - satu CCTV3. JPO depan Kementerian Pariwisata - satu CCTV4. Jembatan penyeberangan MRT dekat Kementerian Pendayagunaan Aparatur Negara dan Reformasi Birokrasi Republik Indonesia - satu CCTV5. Flyover Jalan Layang Non Tol Sudirman ke Thamrin - satu CCTV6. Flyover Jalan Layang Non Tol Thamrin ke Sudirman - satu CCTV7. Simpang bundaran Patung Kuda - tiga CCTV8. Simpang TL Sarinah Bawaslu - empat CCTV9. Simpang TL Sarinah Starbucks - dua CCTV10. JPO Plaza Gajah Mada - satu CCTV (ryh/mik)

More 'Expensive', 'Chameleon' Number Plates Are Easily Recorded by CCTV
01 Nov 2019, 13:48 by, https://www.facebook.com/CNNIndonesia


Illustration. (Photo: CNN Indonesia / Djonet Sugiarto)

Jakarta, CNN Indonesia - The vehicle number plate that can change color is claimed to make it easier for police officers to trap traffic violators through the CCTV ticketing system or Electronic Traffic Law Enforcement (E-TLE). According to the police the vehicle number plate is more clearly recorded on a CCTV camera than the license plate a widely circulated number in the community. Users of 'chameleon' license plates that violate traffic rules will be more easily entangled with CCTV tickets. Please note that this new plate that can change color is not generally accepted, or is welcome for people who are interested in buying it, because this new number plate is included in the preferred number plate program. or Motorized Vehicle Registration Number (NRKB). To obtain this special plate, the community must at least spend more than IDR 5 million to IDR 20 million, in accordance with Government Regulation No. 60 of 2016 concerning Types and Rates of Non-Tax State Revenues (PNBP) that apply to the Indonesian National Police. Whereas the issuance of standard vehicle license plates per pair was only Rp100 thousand for cars and Rp60,000 for motorcycles. Frank, one who used a new number plate obtained a Motorized Vehicle Number (TNKB) because he happened to order a number plate of choice some time ago. Fredi uses a 'beautiful' two-digit and three-letter number plate behind which in the regulation of this choice plate is priced at Rp. 10 million. "When the new plate was found out, it was a model that could change its color. I had wanted it as usual (black), but the official said now for the chosen number plates, everything is like this, "said Fredi via short message, Friday (1/11). According to Fredi it is better to use plate material as before, because he realized this type of plate is easier to 'trace' CCTV ticket. "Yes, he said, this plate is easier to get a CCTV ticket. So he said that the plate number is clearer. But because it can't be used (old use), it's okay," said Fredi. "But strangely now why are given new plates? an electric ticket is just a buy license number, if the standard random number is given ordinary material, "he said later. He said the police should equalize between ordinary and special number plates if the aim is to reduce the number of violations then crossing a camera ticket. "Yeah, that's not fair. Why don't all new number plates use this new material plate, "he said. Director of Registration and Identification (Regident) of the Traffic Corps (Korlantas) National Police Brigadier General Halim Pagarra responded that the provisions of the number plates of the chosen vehicle were very beneficial to consumers. the new NRKB plates can no longer be duplicated by ignorant hands. Halim said that many riders now make fake plates in the style of choice. With this new material, it is certain that it is difficult for people to duplicate NRKB. "Previously it was the same as ordinary plates. Well, the quality is better, right? Then no one dares to make duplicates because of different materials using hot stamping and embossing, not manual paint, "Halim said. Halim said that if a user uses ordinary plates, it does not mean that they cannot be read by CCTV." All of that can be read by CCTV, ordinary plates also can. It's just that the NRKB is clearer. But it can still be read CCTV (for ordinary plates), "Halim said. More than that Halim does not yet know when the plates change color is applied nationally to replace TNKB." I do not know when, because the budget also. That's more to the procurement department, "Halim said. Procurement of TNKB new choice numbers are in six Regional Police Offices, including Regional Police throughout Java and Bali Police, and Lampung Regional Police. So far there are 10 areas with CCTV ticketing systems, previously CCTV tickets were only valid in two old areas on Jalan MH Thamrin and Merdeka Barat Here are 10 new CCTV camera traffic areas: 1. JPO MRT Roundabout Senayan - one CCTV 2. JPO MRT Semanggi MRT - one CCTV 3. JPO in front of the Ministry of Tourism - one CCTV 4 MRT crossing bridge near Ministry of Administrative Reform and Bureaucratic Reform of the Republic of Indonesia - one CCTV 5. Flyover Non Toll Road Sudirman to Thamrin - one CCTV 6. Fly Toll Road Non-Thamrin Flyover to Sudirman - one CCTV 7. Simpang Statue roundabout - three CCTVs 8. Simpinah TL Sarinah Bawaslu - four CCTV 9. Simpang TL Sarinah Starbucks - two CCTV 10. JPO Plaza Gajah Mada - one CCTV (ryh / mik)
